ComicInfo.Summary: La Sirena has captured the betrothed of Major Sly and the British have tracked her to her island hideaway where she has spent her time seducing Ophelia. Sly and his men attack the pirate stronghold and novice soldier Billy Blue captures La Sirena. Sirena is asked to reveal the location of her vast treasure but is unwilling to answer, even under torture. The Catholic priest on board allows his bestial young charge to ravage Ophelia in the hopes that Sirena's love for the girl will force her to speak. When Billy Blue objects to this savage debacle, La Sirena agrees to show her hidden treasures.
ComicInfo.Tags: Billy Blue,El Nino,Jack Sly,La Sirena,Ophelia Strong,The Father
